overview: The comedy 'Ninna' is about the title character, who lives with her son Dennis in Præstø, where she also works at the local takeaway.  When Dennis announces that he wants to move away from home after  his 18th birthday, Ninna's world collapses. She therefore sets out a plan to get him back home. But along the way, Ninna must also revisit her own life and settle on the past. 'Ninna' is a comedy that addresses serious topics and treats them in a humorous light.
title: Ninna
